morning: In the morning we had the buffet, it had a variety of foods that where very yummy ðŸ˜‹ although I didnâ€™t eat much.later Caitlyn came to my (Yeshara) room and we organised what activity craft thing to do next, it took a very long time since it was very hard to find the adresss and the phone number of the place
evening: after the clay mirror decorating we were going to get a grab and 2 of our drivers declined just before coming to us and finally a driver came after 30minutes altogether. when we arrived in the hotel we sat down while  mu(Shenara and Yeshara's) mum looked if one of the restaurants were open. none of them were. since we were a bit tired  we walked down the street and found an open Chinese restaurant. I ordered a noodle  stir fry as well as my sister and Caitlyn had prawn dumpling. we walked back to the hotel and while our parents got ready for a Micheline star restaurants we got ready to have a sleep over
kids_rating: 4 stars today was nice and peaceful and the clay mirror project was very succseful
title: resting day
afternoon: This afternoon, in DIY HOUSE we made clay mirrors, we each did our own unique theme, Shenara did an aesthetic of sunshine daisies with a cute character. Me (Caitlyn), did a pastel gradient with a hint of coquette, Yeashara did a woodland nature theme. It was super fun, however, the staff didn't help that much. The clay making took us around 3 hrs to finish moulding the clay into shapes, gluing our cute flowers and characters, and glossing our mirror for our final touch.
